What better way to celebrate the opening of our newest base in Des Moines than by launching three new routes?

This was our first base opening in nearly a year and a half. And now that the base is officially open, we can continue expanding service and bring new jobs to the area. https://t.co/ltp6JdqceD
And just like that we are adding 🎉TWENTY-THREE🎉 brand new routes to our nonstop network! #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/amzg7mWjPe

And away we go! 

📸: ajaviation https://t.co/tDFq3Zr3eW

The energy of Pride runs through our veins every day. At its core, Pride is a celebration. And we are proud to celebrate the spectacularly diverse people of our Allegiant team, our customers, and the communities we serve. 

You put the "Together" in "Together We Fly." https://t.co/3ZfwNdgXLc

Congratulations to the @GoldenKnights on a great run in the playoffs! We couldn't be more proud to be The Official Domestic Airline of the Vegas Golden Knights. #VegasBorn

📸: skyfresno https://t.co/LxbI3BUBST

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @kannchy Hi there! We are sorry to hear about this. We have an ACAA Department that is solely dedicated to handling these types of claims. If you are not already in contact with them, please direct your communication to them here: https://t.co/fP8K46I26K - C
@taybay4 We're sorry to hear of your frustration. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM so that we may review your flight details. -JH
@totaljack1277 We're so sorry to hear this. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. A member of our team would be happy to review your flight details. -JH
@esshort1983 We're very sorry to hear of your frustration. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH
@JesseRas We love to hear that. Thanks for the shoutout! -JH
@liz_r_collier We're very sorry to hear this Elizabeth. Please send us a DM if you have not been assisted. -JH
@taylorcerjan A copy of a lap infants birth certificate is sufficient identification for travel. -JH

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @budlightpete1 We're so sorry to hear of your frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH

@chasngwatrflls We're sorry to hear this. Each airline is given approval by air traffic control on which gates can be used, gates are also reserved for incoming flights for alternate carriers. This can cause further delays if a flight does not arrive at the originally scheduled time. -JH
@Ravelsthoughts We LOVE to hear this! Thank you so much for the shoutout. - JH 🧡💙
@berdman5thou Hi! We are very sorry to hear of any disruption in travel. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM for a member of our team to review your flight details. -JH

data.text: @its__chloe____ We absolutely appreciate your business and your patience. We are currently receiving an influx of messages. If your concern has not been resolved, please send us a DM. -JH
@LAP05 We are very sorry to hear this. Please feel free to send us a DM with your flight details so that we may better assist. -JH
@JBabin99 We're very sorry to hear of your delayed flight. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH
@AdamsRacing33 Hi there! We're so sorry to hear that. If you have not been assisted, please send us a DM and we would be happy to provide any troubleshooting tools. -JH
@vickisawney7 I'm so sorry to hear that, but we always prioritize the safety of our customers and crew. If you need assistance from our team, please feel free to send us a DM. -JH
@_hay_m_ We're very sorry to hear of your disruption in travel and truly appreciate your patience. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH

Those three little words get us every time. 🥰

"Hello. Welcome aboard."

📸: musnic36 https://t.co/HysRVCHgIw

@Geb_Ryan Hi Gerald! Thank you for your patience, as we have been receiving an unprecedented number of communications recently. Our records indicate that a member of our team has replied to you in FB Messenger. Please continue with them there. - C

@its__chloe____ Hi Chloe! A number of flights out of VPS are being delayed today due to TSA and airport facility limitations. If you have a reservation with us and have specific questions regarding that reservation, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@LeslieAMarshall We LOVE hearing this! Thanks so much for the shoutout. We look forward to serving you again in the future. 😀💙🧡💛 - C
@MamacitaOTM Hi there! If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@coachpace Hi Lisa! We have been receiving an unprecedented number of communications recently. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@nyecoal Hi Nicole! We're sorry to hear about this. If you are still in need of assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@DrPain28 Our website is up and running at this time, as we continue to receive new bookings and changes to existing reservations each minute. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@D4vvg Hi there! We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. We are also available via Chat, Email & Social Media platforms. If you need assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @NiJanel We’re so sorry to hear about this! If you were unable to report checked baggage issues at the airport, please email us about your damaged baggage here: https://t.co/pRy6k7IsSK - C
@Aaron97___ Hi Aaron! We've made it easy for you to change/cancel your itinerary by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX If you need further assistance, please send us a DM. - C
@jaredwards13 Hi Jared! Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details so that a member of our team can look into this with you. - C

@dkbliven Hi Dustin! Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that we may look into it this for you. Please also consider deleting this Tweet, as we do not want your confirmation number to be publicly visible. - C

@b1ack_outz Hi there! We have been receiving an unprecedented number of communications recently. If you are still in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to assist you. - C
@lucy1227sweet5 Hi Tammy! If you are still in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information so that we may look into this for you. - C

@EricMor95090188 Hi Eric! We're sorry to hear about this. Seat changes can occur for a number of reasons. If you are still in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details so that we may look into it for you. - C
@DuchessWutzke Hi there! The answer to your question is yes, you can. - C

@DLivingway Hi Dennis! Our airport ticket counters are staffed from two hours prior to the estimated time of departure to 45 minutes prior to the estimated time of departure. Allegiant maintains one of the highest controllable completion rates of any domestic carrier. - C

urls.title: Manage Travel | Sign-In to View Your Flight Information
urls.description: Manage your trip by adding cheap hotels, theme park passes, attraction tickets, car rental deals and much more.

data.text: @anirupdutta Hi there! You can add a pet to any existing reservation by going under "Manage Trip" on our official website. https://t.co/S5KANKVtkd - C
@mrsnicolini Hi Jennifer! We are disappointed to hear this. If you need assistance, please send us a DM if you need assistance. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@t_vaughan11 Hi Thomas! We're so sorry for any frustrations. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@Brad_Dion Hi Brad! We're so sorry for any frustrations. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@G_SO_Blu Hi there! We see your message and we do answer all messages in the order received. We will be with you real soon. - GM
@aja_white_ Hi there! We are so sorry you are having a hard time reaching us. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@Wright2Tyler We don’t require a COVID test to fly. But because COVID policies vary from region to region, we do recommend that our customers familiarize themselves with local requirements and ordinances where they will be traveling. - GM
@Sammyherrick Hi Samm! Feel welcome to send us a DM. We are experiencing longer than normal response times. We will be with you soon. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@josselynnnc Hi Josselyn! We are so sorry to learn about your delay. Our top priority is to get each and every one of our passengers to their destination on time, but we will never sacrifice safety to meet an on-time departure or arrival. - GM
@esshort1983 Hi there! We are so sorry for the hold. We are currently experiencing a higher than normal hold time. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@Cynetra3 Hi there! Our DM's are answered in the order received. We are currently experiencing an influx of messages. We appreciate your patience and we will be with you real soon! - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@Geb_Ryan Hi Gerald! If you have already sent us a DM, we will be with you soon. - GM

urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @blak We are so sorry to hear this! To file a lost item claim, please follow this link: https://t.co/fP8K46I26K - GM

@NitrogueYT Hi Nitrogue! We absolutely appreciate your business and your patience. We are currently receiving an influx of messages. If you need assistance, please send us a DM we will be happy to look into this for you. – GM

@norathomp Hi Elenora! We absolutely appreciate your business and your patience. We are currently receiving an influx of messages. If you need assistance, please send us a DM we will be happy to look into this for you. – GM

@WarDamnReed Hi War! We absolutely appreciate your business and your patience. We are currently receiving an influx of messages. If you need assistance, please send us a DM we will be happy to look into this for you. – GM

@keslaughter1 Hi Kes! We absolutely appreciate your business and your patience. We are currently receiving an influx of messages. If you need assistance, please send us a DM we will be happy to look into this for you. – GM
@parlexkirock Hi there! We're so sorry to learn about any frustrations. Please send us a DM and we will be happy to look into this for you. - GM

@SALES_720 Unfortunately, we are experiencing a high call volume at the moment but our Call Center is open 24/7 and can be contacted at. Alternatively, you can send us a private message if you need assistance from our team. https://t.co/s2LlutxZLB. - GM
@Vanessa81918984 Hi Vanessa! We're sorry you are having a hard time reaching us. Please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@angelinaaucello If you need assistance, please send us a DM. We are experiencing longer than normal hold times. We are working diligently to handle all requests. We appreciate your patience. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@mitchiechhay Hi Mitchie! We are so sorry to learn about your frustrations. Please send us a DM, if you already have we we will be with you soon. Thank you for your patience. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@praveensrao Hi! Please send us a DM, with your confirmation number and email on file. We would be happy to look into this for you. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@KristenAguirre Hi Kristen. We're sorry you are having a hard time reaching us. We are working diligently to assist everyone. If you have not yet sent us a messages, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBuBVaM
@Joanna_Ray11 Hi Joanna! We would be happy to review. Please send us a DM, please note we answer all requests in the order received. - GM
@vyrotek We see your DM's and answer in the order received. We will be with you when we get to your request. Thank you for your patience. - GM
@burritytime Hi there! We will be happy to help, please send us a DM if you need assistance. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@The_Sarahnade Hi Sarah! We will be happy to help. Please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@DeanMaserati Hi Dean! Please send us a DM and we will be happy to review. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@aniterasjuices Hi Anitera! We're so sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM, so we may best assist you. - GM
Please say hello to our newest class of Allegiant flight attendants! 👏 #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/5mBHLMZT62
@Continental80 Any time! 🙌 - GM
@Continental80 Hi Brian! Yes, we have a flight available from SFB to EYW on August 13. To view current rates, please visit our official website by following this link: https://t.co/ZO3TO3oCUM. - GM

@vyrotek Hi there! We are receiving an influx of messages and have delayed our response times. We appreciate your patience. If you haven't sent us DM, please do so and we will be with you soon. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@jnschaef Hi Jennifer! We're sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM with your details and we will be happy to review. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@THEDestinyRaven We're so sorry you are having a hard time reaching us. If you have not yet already, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@marleefinz Hi DM's are answered in the order received. We are receiving an influx of messages at this time. We appreciate your patience. - GM

@karasfairytale We certainly understand the desire to get the lowest possible fare. However, we do not refund or credit fare differences after a reservation has been booked. For more information, please visit https://t.co/2tbIkJ2Ob1. - GM
@SheriffBrandon Hi Brandon. We're sorry you are having a hard time reaching us to add your niece. If you need assistance, please send us DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@Aelex33 Hi Aleq! We are so sorry you are having a hard time reaching us. We are currently receiving an influx of messages and answer in the order received. If you have not already, please send us a DM. - GM
